subject: Automobiles
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. wheeled migration can begin: players who don't reside in the cities where they play are searching for ways to get their Bentleys, Cadillac Escalades and Range Rovers home.
snippet: The N.B.A. wheeled migration can begin: players who don't reside in the cities where they play are searching for ways to get their Bentleys, Cadillac Escalades and Range Rovers home.
